entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning changing to a few rain showers or flurries near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
